Details.Name: GreateFor
Details.Feature: Unlimited complimentary Priority Pass membership access to 700 VIP airport lounges globally

Comprehensive travel insurance programme covering over 20 benefits of up to US$2 million (annual value worth S$988^). Protected against unforeseen travel events like emergency evacuation and repatriation, medical expenses, trip cancellation, loss of baggage/travel documents, rental car excess, and personal liability to third party damages.
Unlimited access to one-way limousine transfer to the airport and expedited immigration clearance at key airports in Asia

Details.Name: SmallPrint
Details.Feature: ^Based on exclusively tailored benefits for HSBC Visa Infinite cardholders on extended family plan basis. Charge full travel expense to the HSBC Visa Infinite card to enjoy automatic coverage.
Unlimited complimentary one-way limousine transfer to the airport and expedited immigration clearance services require a minimum S$5,000 quarterly spending.
